name: ExperiencesOfDiscrimination
title: Experiences of Discrimination
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing questions intended to capture experiences of discrimination.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who documented answers to
questions intended to capture experiences of discrimination.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Experiences of Discrimination.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Experiences of Discrimination.)

contains.display: At any time in your life, have you ever been unfairly fired [PhenX]
What do you think was the main reason for this experience [PhenX]
For unfair reasons, have you ever not been hired for a job [PhenX]
Have you ever been unfairly denied a promotion [PhenX]
Have you ever been unfairly stopped, searched, questioned, physically threatened or abused by the police [PhenX]
Have you ever been unfairly denied a bank loan [PhenX]
Have you ever received service from someone such as a plumber or car mechanic that was worse than what other people get [PhenX]
You have been treated with less courtesy than other people [PhenX]
You have been treated with less respect than other people [PhenX]
You have received poorer service than other people at restaurants or stores [PhenX]
People have acted as if they think you are not smart [PhenX]
People have acted as if they are afraid of you [PhenX]
People have acted as if they think you are dishonest [PhenX]
People have acted as if they're better than you are [PhenX]
You have been called names or insulted [PhenX]
You have been threatened or harassed [PhenX]
You have been followed around in stores [PhenX]
Have you ever been unfairly discouraged by a teacher or advisor from continuing your education [PhenX]
Have you ever been unfairly prevented from moving into a neighborhood because the landlord or a realtor refused to sell or rent you a house or apartment [PhenX]
Have you ever moved into a neighborhood where neighbors made life difficult for you or your family [PhenX]
